CustomField.formula: Case( DescriptionScoreCLTV_Life__c, "Cero Estrellas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.CLTV_Life__c, IMAGE($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.Info_Icon__c, "Info Icon", 16, 16) & " " & IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_000.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "Una Estrella", HYPERLINK($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.CLTV_Life__c, IMAGE($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.Info_Icon__c, "Info Icon", 16, 16) & " " & IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_100.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "Dos Estrellas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.CLTV_Life__c, IMAGE($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.Info_Icon__c, "Info Icon", 16, 16) & " " & IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_200.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "Tres Estrellas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.CLTV_Life__c, IMAGE($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.Info_Icon__c, "Info Icon", 16, 16) & " " & IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_300.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "Cuatro Estrellas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.CLTV_Life__c, IMAGE($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.Info_Icon__c, "Info Icon", 16, 16) & " " & IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "Cinco Estrellas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.CLTV_Life__c, IMAGE($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.Info_Icon__c, "Info Icon", 16, 16) & " " & IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), $Label.ZRM_GlobalCustomerValue_NoValue )
CustomField.label: Global Customer Value (Life)
